name: Pixel Madness
description:
- About the game -

Pixel Madness - is simple 2D clicker game but with cool key elements that will help you achieve your goals and make your gameplay more fun.

- You can -

CRAFTING

- use your workbench to craft different materials from different resources.

TRANSMUTATIONS

- use your "Magic knowledge" to splice essences into something very cool.

DIFFERENT WORLDS

- visit different locations to obtain better resources with more XP.

BOSS FIGHTING

- fight different bosses to earn XP and maybe you can even get a good reward after beating the boss.

WORLDS

- use the unknown power to travel between different worlds to farm even more different resources.

ACHIEVEMENTS

- complete goals and unlock cool looking pixel images called achievements.

- More... -


Our biggest goal is to make a really good community that is really interested in what we are doing and also wants to be a part of the game development!

We are going to make a lot of updates in the future with new mechanics/bosses/locations and more, so don't forget to join our official discord server to know about all our announcements & updates!
